member.name: T:Saml.MetadataBuilder.AuthenticationContext

member.name: T:Saml.MetadataBuilder.EntityDescriptor
member.summary: This base class that creates the metadata.

summary.para:
*Required*
The unique identifier of the SAML entity which is described by this definition.
Example: dev.contoso.com

Optional
The expiration time of the metadata.
Example: 2028-01-21T18:12:29.287Z

Optional
The maximum length of time a consumer should cache the metadata.
Example: PT604800S

Optional
A document-unique identifier for the element, typically used as a reference point when signing.
Example: 35D0C44A-52CE-4D2F-BE06-AE5F00C30AA7

Optional for Service Providers
Required for Identity Providers
Used to include a digital signature that can be used to sign various elements in a metadata definition.

Optional
Used to include metadata extensions that are agreed upon between a metadata publisher and the consumer.

*Required*
Used to describe the role or capabilities of the SAML entity.

Optional
Used to identifying the organization responsible for the SAML entity, it possible to include details such as organization’s name, display name, URL.

Optional
used to provide various kind of information about a contact person such as individuals’ name, email address and phone numbers.

Optional
Used to provide a set of locations where additional metadata exists for the current SAML entity.
